item.title: Where’s the Outrage? It Takes Comedians to Stand Up to Newt’s Hypocrisy
item.description: “Where’s the Outrage? It Takes Comedians to Stand Up to Newt’s Hypocrisy” appeared in the Huffington Post, January 27, 2012."
